I

init() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
Initializes the game that has to be initialized.
init() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.RemoteConnection
This method initializes this remoteConnection, building the object streams for network communication and executing the "handshaking" phase with che client, during which the client has to insert a valid nickname and number of players before it can start a game.
init() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUIClientView
This method tries to initialize this GUIClientView, attempting the connection to the server.
initialize(URL, ResourceBundle) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gui.GameSceneController

initializeConnection(RemoteConnection) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.RemoteView
Link up this class with an instance of RemoteConnection that will manage socket communication.

A boolean method, synchronized between different players' connections.
